AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master orichalcum smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had trained under the watchful eye of one of the best smiths in Orsinium, who in turn had also trained been trained by a master smith. Thanks to this opportunity, [PAWN_nameDef] followed in the footsteps of [PAWN_possessive] master, and became highly skilled at working orichalcum. A truly temperamental metal, just like [PAWN_nameDef].
